verses.verse: Vindicate <S%H8199><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> God, and plead <S%H7378><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%> against an ungodly <S%H3808><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%> Oh, <S%H6403><s%> deliver me from deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and wicked <S%H5766><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

For you are the God <S%H430><s%> of my strength. <S%H4581><s%> Why have you rejected <S%H2186><s%> me? <S%H1980><s%> Why do I go mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy? <S%H341><s%>

Oh, <S%H7971><s%> send out your light <S%H216><s%> and your truth. <S%H571><s%> Let them lead <S%H5148><s%> me. <S%H935><s%> Let them bring me to your holy <S%H6944><s%> hill, <S%H2022><s%> To your tents. <S%H4908><s%>

Then I will go <S%H935><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> my exceeding <S%H8057><s%> joy. <S%H1524><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you on the harp, <S%H3658><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

Why are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> my soul? <S%H5315><s%> Why are you disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within me? <S%H3176><s%> Hope in God! <S%H430><s%> For I shall still praise <S%H3034><s%> him: <S%H6440><s%> my Savior, my helper, <S%H3444><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
